programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: Puthu Vasantham
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: Ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: Ananda Ragam
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - Rajachinna Roja
programme.desc: Raja, an aspiring actor from a village, relocates to a big city to follow his dream. There, he meets his childhood friend who promises him an acting job but later learns about his evil intentions.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - Rajachinna Roja
programme.desc: Raja, an aspiring actor from a village, relocates to a big city to follow his dream. There, he meets his childhood friend who promises him an acting job but later learns about his evil intentions.

programme.title: Ramayanam
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ethirneechal Thodargiradhu
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Gardez Le Sourire
programme.desc: Vienna in the 1930s. Jean has no work and nowhere to live. He is so desperate that he thinks about drowning himself in the Danube. But a young woman, Marie, jumps off a bridge just before him. Jean saves her and comforts her. Suicide is never an option again.

programme.title: Allegresse
programme.desc: Whilst he's supposed to be looking after his daughter, with whom he isn't particularly close, a funeral director is entrusted with the ashes of a complete unknown. Together they try to find a way to pay tribute to the deceased and end up forging unexpected ties...

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 13
programme.desc: It's nearly the end of the year. And as always Jean-Pierre has a hectic New Year's Eve programme planned with talent competitions for all the family: singing, magic and ventriloquism.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 1
programme.desc: It's 1980 and the young Jean-Pierre is organising a mega disco party. Young Francois takes his father's advice very seriously when it comes to being the perfect partner for his first slow dance. Meanwhile Rollande has become totally addicted to Danielle Cuivre's books.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 2
programme.desc: An episode where fiction meets reality. Francois presents his book ''Discussions With My Parents'' to his parents and tells them that a TV series is planned. Each gives their own opinion on the matter.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 3
programme.desc: Francois is invited to take part in a new scientific quiz show. He'll also be introducing Stephanie's parents to his own. And everyone has high expectations of the meeting.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 12
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Vers Les Sommets - EP 4
programme.desc: Three professional mountaineers, the Swiss Stephan Siegrist and Germans Thomas and Alexander Huber, attempt a new line up the North Face of the Eiger. They have given themselves three years to prepare and plan this route into the unknown, a major challenge dedicated to absent friends, mountaineers who have died.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 11
programme.desc: Each year, we produce more and more plastic. And plastic is everywhere. Especially in waste. Can we recycle plastic materials forever for example? Or can we convert them into ''organic'' plastic? We take a closer look in the company of Aurore Richel, chemist.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 791
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1567
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Habitants Du Nord - EP 9
programme.desc: With the help of a historian and Gerry, Kylik's uncle, Nadia and Vincent retrace the steps of Albert Johnson, known as the ''mad trapper''. They go to Aklavik, the starting point of a manhunt lasting 48 days which fascinated the public back in 1932.

programme.title: Megastructures Romaines En Gaule - EP 3
programme.desc: With its 2,185 monuments, Paris is a world tourism capital. The City of Light also shelters ruins that bear witness to the Gallo-Roman period: a few metres from Place Monge, the Arena of Lutetia is amongst the oldest remains from these ancient times, along with the Cluny thermal baths.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Classe De Chefs - EP 9
programme.desc: Chefs Boucher and Sparks-Beaule test the students to find out what they've learned. As part of their final exam, they need to impress the judges, delighting eye as much as palate. At the ITHQ restaurant, Mathieu and Maria learn from Chef Sirois' experience.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Habitants Du Nord - EP 9
programme.desc: With the help of a historian and Gerry, Kylik's uncle, Nadia and Vincent retrace the steps of Albert Johnson, known as the ''mad trapper''. They go to Aklavik, the starting point of a manhunt lasting 48 days which fascinated the public back in 1932.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 26
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 40
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse - EP 14
programme.desc: Octave is completely out of breath when he gets to Maryse's door, he's just run a marathon. Maryse immediately writes a nursery rhyme to congratulate her friend on his achievement.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 29
programme.desc: To avoid waste, Charlie and Elliot are wondering how to cook the remains of their festive meals. Chef Guillaume Cantin teaches them some delicious recipes.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 30
programme.desc: Charlie and Elliot want to make their presents themselves. They call on the singer Martin Deschamps who teaches them how to add a personal touch to some bags they can then offer to friends and family.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 33
programme.desc: When Alix arrives in the land of the Wonderfolk, Big Boss is stressed out at the idea of having to address all her subjects. Alix immediately offers to help her practice giving her speech.

programme.title: Classe De Chefs - EP 9
programme.desc: Chefs Boucher and Sparks-Beaule test the students to find out what they've learned. As part of their final exam, they need to impress the judges, delighting eye as much as palate. At the ITHQ restaurant, Mathieu and Maria learn from Chef Sirois' experience.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1568
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'amour Du Monde
programme.desc: Margaux, 15 years old, is spending her holidays with her father and his new partner. During an internship at a home for children in difficulty, she befriends Juliette, 7 years old, and Joel, a thirty-something fisherman returning from Indonesia. A meeting that will upend her summer...

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 5
programme.desc: The friends take a weekend break to switch off, but their various child-based concerns soon catch up with them. Annie is wondering if she should accept the day-care place, Josee has to handle the reproaches made by her ex, and Nadine is worrying about her daughter.

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 6
programme.desc: Josee invites everyone over to her place for a major announcement. Kamyar and Nadine arrive with all four kids in tow and Annie is concerned that the house won't be sufficiently baby-proof for little edouard. Megane is finding it very difficult to share her space with so many people.

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 7
programme.desc: During Megane's dance show, Josee is squashed between her ex and his new partner who are obviously not getting on, at all. Nadine is worried about Jasmine who's fantasising about tattoos.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 20
programme.desc: The Cluny Museum recounts mediaeval art. Gastronomy on a plate with chef Victor Mercier: you don't need to travel far to discover new horizons! Bold, powerful and always sublime, Saint Laurent artistic director Anthony Vaccarello transforms women. Creations by ceramist Charlotte Castro.

programme.title: En Terre Animale - EP 14
programme.desc: Franck and Muffin visit a llama farm in the Doubs. In Besancon, they set out to discover the wildlife that has made its home in the capital of the Franche-Comte, a population that includes ducks, cormorants, chamois, beaver, coypu and many others.

programme.title: Crime A Biot
programme.desc: Marie Lemaire, wealthy heiress, is poisoned during a dinner of the Biot Trade Association, making all the guests potential suspects. Two days later, another of those present dies, poisoned, leaving a suicide note and confessing to the murder. But the deputy public prosecutor elisabeth Richard remains unconvinced.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 12
programme.desc: The sea is rising. Will our feet be in water one day on the Grand Square of Brussels? And above all, what can we do to avoid disasters? Answers in the company of Frank Pattyn, glaciologist at the Free University of Brussels.

programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Megastructures Romaines En Gaule - EP 2
programme.desc: During the conquest of Gaul, entire cities rallied the Roman cause without fighting, even enjoying the largesse of the emperors. A Unesco World Heritage site, Arles still bears witness to this past era: its amphitheatre a replica of the Coliseum, its circus one of the best known in Gaul.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 792
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1568
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: En Terre Animale - EP 14
programme.desc: Franck and Muffin visit a llama farm in the Doubs. In Besancon, they set out to discover the wildlife that has made its home in the capital of the Franche-Comte, a population that includes ducks, cormorants, chamois, beaver, coypu and many others.

programme.title: Fantomas Demasque
programme.desc: Fantomas, such a strange phenomenon! For many, the masked character evoked Andre Hunebelle's films starring Jean Marais, Louis de Funes and Mylene Demongeot. Yet in 1968, Marcel Allain already pointed out that he was the joint creator, with Pierre Souvestre, and that the real Fantomas was dark, harsh, evil, terrifying...

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 14
programme.desc: The heights of Clermont-Ferrand, facing the Puy-de-Dome, are the starting point for a gourmet and crunchy tour enjoying apples.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: En Terre Animale - EP 14
programme.desc: Franck and Muffin visit a llama farm in the Doubs. In Besancon, they set out to discover the wildlife that has made its home in the capital of the Franche-Comte, a population that includes ducks, cormorants, chamois, beaver, coypu and many others.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 27
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 41
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse - EP 15
programme.desc: Octave has broken Maryse's lovely cup. He runs home to glue it back together again, whilst Maryse writes a nursery rhyme to say that she forgives him.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 1
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 34
programme.desc: Alix has created the first ever fire brigade in the land of the Wonderfolk and puts Humpty in charge.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 14
programme.desc: The heights of Clermont-Ferrand, facing the Puy-de-Dome, are the starting point for a gourmet and crunchy tour enjoying apples.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Vent Des Sables
programme.desc: In Sables-d'Olonne, everything is ready for the start of the Vendee Globe. While the sailors in the race are getting ready to set sail, the murder of a local figure disrupts the preparations. The victim was the sponsor of one of the participants, Yannick Berthome. Lieutenants Kamara and Finet take charge of the investigation.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 5
programme.desc: Walk along the forgotten tracks in the Basque Country. Enthusiasts rediscover deserted paths, bring magnificent abandoned villas back to life or add a modern touch to local cuisine. In their way, they perpetuate historical memories.

programme.title: Movie - Friends
programme.desc: A man values his best friend more than anything else in the world. One day he confesses a dark secret from their childhood to his wife, which is overheard by another. Once the secret gets out, the friendship is destroyed.

programme.title: Movie - Pori
programme.desc: Hari's father, a retired teacher, helps him in setting up a bookshop but a businessman from Malaysia claims that it belongs to him. As Hari begins to investigate, a real estate scam is exposed.

programme.title: Movie - Machie
programme.desc: Dushyant, a rich spoilt brat, arrives from Mumbai to study in a college in Kovai. As a fresher in a medical college, he meets four of his classmates who are not city slickers like him and come from middle-class families.

programme.title: Movie - Mahan Kanakku
programme.desc: Jeeva's brother-in-law is harassed by bank officials despite having paid off all loans. When he finally commits suicide, Jeeva takes advantage of the loopholes in banking to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Jananam
programme.desc: An angry young man is deeply affected by the sufferings of his friends who struggle to find a job. This leads him to lash out against the corrupt society.

programme.title: Movie - Melmaruvathur Arpudhangal
programme.desc: A god-fearing woman gets married to a man who is equally religious. However, her life turns upside down when her husband accuses her of being unfaithful.

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Mappillai
programme.desc: Thangadurai, who works as a coolie, lies to Janaki that he is rich and marries her. When Janaki's mother learns about this, she plots to destroy their marriage, but succumbs to their love.

programme.title: Movie - Avasara Police 100
programme.desc: A hardened criminal seeks revenge against his father for abandoning his mother. Soon, he finds a policeman who is a doppelganger of himself and decides to manipulate him for his own motive.

programme.title: Movie - Pottu Amman
programme.desc: A black magician kills 27 babies, each born under a different star, to attain extraordinary powers. However, he realises that he has to kill one more baby, born under a rare star, to become omnipotent. Pottu Amman comes to rescue the baby from the black magician.

programme.title: Movie - Ennavale
programme.desc: Lakshmi, a landlord's daughter, encourages James, a struggling singer, to gain recognition. However when James proposes to her, Lakshmi turns him down due to her bitter past.

programme.title: Movie - Maharani
programme.desc: A young man marries a beautiful woman but never tells her about his former girlfriend. As the couple settles into matrimony, his ex-lover makes a shocking return and complicates their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Maharantham
programme.desc: Shankar, who loves Kalpana, promises a dying father that he will marry his terminally ill daughter Geeta. He marries them both. His devotion towards Geeta causes trouble between him and Kalpana.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kathanayagan
programme.desc: Katha Nayagan is a 1988 Indian Tamil-language comedy film, directed by Muktha Srinivasan and produced by Ramaswamy Govind.

programme.title: Movie - Kizhakku Karai
programme.desc: After Murali convinces his father Ranganathan to quit working as a smuggler for Daaha, the gangster kills the latter, which leads to a surprising turn of events.

programme.title: Movie - Coolie
programme.desc: Karna, a labourer, marries his boss' daughter Vimala, while his sister marries Vimala's brother. However, problems arise when Vimala's father tries to cause a rift between Karna and his sister.

programme.title: Movie - Jai Hind
programme.desc: After his brother is killed in a terrorist attack, Bharath, a policeman, assures his mother that he will resign. However, when he learns of a secret terrorist organisation, he sets out to capture them.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal Sugamanathu
programme.desc: A woman loves a man but does not have the courage to confess her feelings. Instead, she asks her younger sister to approach her love interest. However her sister betrays her by proposing to him herself.

The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 5
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by title winning captains Tim Sherwood and Wes Morgan to relive the two greatest underdog stories of the Premier League era.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen is the latest guest in the PL Moments hotseat as he chooses the top ten days from his Premier League career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypiä's journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernán Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former Chelsea and Tottenham midfielder Gus Poyet chooses the best eleven teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 2
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by Premier League winners Owen Hargreaves and Peter Schmeichel to discuss the best title-winning teams in the Premier League era. Expect insightful anecdotes, interesting archive and lively debate across a packed hour-long programme.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 13
programme.desc: In this episode of 1-to-11, the legend that is Claude Makelele selects his ultimate Premier League One to Eleven, featuring the very best players he played with and against. His line-up is filled with world-class talent, boasting legendary names from across the globe who shared the pitch with him during his time in the Premier League.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard joins former England teammate Owen Hargreaves to examine exactly what it takes to become an elite central midfielder.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest striker the Premier League has ever seen, Thierry Henry sits down with Will Perry to reveal his Top 10 Premier League Moments.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 38
programme.desc: After a meteoric rise through Cardiff's youth system, Aaron Ramsey's dream of playing for one of the world's biggest clubs was realised. But just as his career was reaching new heights, a devastating double leg break threatened to bring it all crashing down. The Wales captain takes us through his footballing journey to date.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 15
programme.desc: With over 200 appearances for Everton, Tim Cahill established himself as the high-energy midfielder who helped drive the side. For PL Stories this week, Cahill talks through his journey to the Premier League from battling his way to make it as a footballer in his native Australia, leaving home as a teenager and adapting to English life, scoring in a World Cup as well as the difficult decision to leave Goodison Park after 8 years.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Former Everton midfielder Leon Osman celebrates the history of Goodison Park and selects the ten greatest Premier League moments to have happened at the iconic stadium

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: Tony Pulis looks back on his most memorable moments at the helm of Stoke City, including the Potters' first-ever appearance in the Premier League in the 2008/09 season.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 14
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2017/2018 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: From his humble beginnings at Queen's Park in Scotland to becoming a key player for Liverpool, Andy Robertson's rise is a tale of resilience, hard work, and determination. We delve in to his early struggles, his breakthrough at Hull City, and his crucial role in Liverpool's historic Premier League and Champions League triumphs.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: FS MMA Patti Lee vs. Nicdali Calanoc
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Women take the ring in Vancouver, Canada, as Patti Lee brawls Nicdali Calanoc.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Isidro Ranoni Prieto
programme.desc: From the Lac Leamy Casino in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, NABA Light Heavyweight Champion Artur Beterbiev looks to continue his streak of knockout victories and secure a shot at the World Title as he steps into the ring against Isidro Ranoni Prieto (26-1, 22 KOs). Beterbiev, the Russian Olympian and Gold Medalist from the World Championships in Milan, enters the fight with a record of 10-0, not allowing any of his opponents to reach the final bell.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Tayfun Ozcan vs Mohamed Khamal
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from the Martini Plaza in Groningen, the Netherlands, features main event Tayfun Ozcan (Turkey) vs. Mohamed Khamal (Morocco).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Shodai, Takakeisho, Ryuden and Aoiyama from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Emmanuel Rodriguez vs. Melvin Lopez
programme.desc: From the MGM National Harbor in Oxon Hill, Maryland, a main event showdown between two of the world's top bantamweights, Emmanuel Rodriguez and Melvin Lopez, will decide the IBF Bantamweight World Champion. Rodriguez (21-2) is a former world champion, enters the bout off a victory over undefeated Gary Antonio Russell, and now sits at #2 in the world rankings according to the IBF.

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Miguel Rodriguez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated Andre Berto (21-0, 18 KOs) battling Miguel Angel Rodriguez, aka 'Miki', (29-2, 23 KOs)i for the vacant WBC Welterweight Title from the FedEx Forum in Memphis, Tennessee, USA on June 21, 2008. Bonus coverage includes Chris 'The Nightmare' Arreola (23-0, 21 KOs) vs. Chazz Witherspoon (23-0, 15 KOs).

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Errol Zimmerman vs Nidal Bchiri
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It''s kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from the Lotto Arena in Antwerp, Belgium, features main event Errol 'The Bonecrusher' Zimmerman (The Netherlands) vs. Nidal Bchiri (Morocco). Bonus coverage includes Wail Karroumi vs Lofogo Sarour and Chahid Oulad El Hadj vs Nordin Van Roosmalen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

Show 1 featuring Takakeisho, Hakuho, Hokutofuji and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.desc: This episode features a super middleweight brawl between top contenders Adonis Stevenson and Jesus Gonzales that includes a Knockout of the Year candidate, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 2

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 5

After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 6

She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett star in this remarkable tale of the life and loves of a man experiencing his life backwards.

programme.title: Blackberry
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of BlackBerry, the company responsible for inventing the smartphone.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: A stuntman working a movie production is hired to find the missing lead actor, instead, he gets framed for a murder.

programme.title: The White Lotus S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: The social satire is set at an exclusive Thai resort and follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: A wickedly dark comedy about dominatrix, Rebecca and her wealthy client Hal. A battle of wills ensues over the course of one incredibly fraught night, with both struggling to keep the upper hand as the power dynamics swing wildly back and forth.

programme.title: Outside The Bubble: On The Road With Alexandra Pelosi
programme.desc: Intent on escaping her coastal bubble, Alexandra Pelosi sets out to engage in conversations with fellow Americans in an effort to gain an unfiltered understanding of other perspectives.

programme.title: Mary, Queen Of Scots
programme.desc: Widowed at 18, Mary Stuart defies the pressure to remarry and returns to her native Scotland to asserts her claim to the English throne, threatening Elizabeth I’s sovereignty.

programme.title: The Outsider S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Season finale. The group finds itself in a climactic showdown in their last-ditch effort to root out El Coco.

programme.title: Respect
programme.desc: The life story of legendary R&B singer, Aretha Franklin.

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
programme.desc: A young Hispanic woman must choose between ambition and tradition in this coming of age comedy where real women embrace life...and have curves.

programme.title: PU-239
programme.desc: A worker at a Russian nuclear plant steals a small amount of weapons grade plutonium and tries to sell it on the Moscow black market.

programme.title: The Head S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the middle of the winter, a small group of scientists in charge of an international base in the Antartica during the long polar nights stops communicating with the outside world.

programme.title: House Of Gucci
programme.desc: When Patrizia Reggiani (Lady Gaga), an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel the family legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately... murder.

programme.title: Outside The Bubble: On The Road With Alexandra Pelosi
programme.desc: Intent on escaping her coastal bubble, Alexandra Pelosi sets out to engage in conversations with fellow Americans in an effort to gain an unfiltered understanding of other perspectives.

programme.title: Love To Love You, Donna Summer
programme.desc: This HBO original documentary offers an in-depth look at the iconic Donna Summer, whose music became the defining soundtrack of an era.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: Mistrial
programme.desc: Police officer Bill Pullman holds a court hostage and forces a new trial to be held when a man he believes to be a cop-killer walks on a technicality.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1 - EP 1107
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Respect
programme.desc: The life story of legendary R&B singer, Aretha Franklin.

programme.title: The White Lotus S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: The social satire is set at an exclusive Thai resort and follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A father and teen daughter attend a pop concert, where they realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.

programme.title: The Head S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the middle of the winter, a small group of scientists in charge of an international base in the Antartica during the long polar nights stops communicating with the outside world.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: The darkest chapter of this horror franchise goes back to the beginning, before the haunting of the Lambert family.

programme.title: The Inventor: Out For Blood In Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Alex Gibney's documentary examines the rise and fall of Theranos, the one-time multibillion-dollar healthcare company founded by Elizabeth Holmes.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: When three friends get together for one last weekend-long bachelor party in Vegas, they think they had a good time.

programme.title: The Head S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The summer team tries to find clues of what could have happened during the winter, unveiling a first possible suspect.

programme.title: Mistrial
programme.desc: Police officer Bill Pullman holds a court hostage and forces a new trial to be held when a man he believes to be a cop-killer walks on a technicality.

programme.title: The White Lotus S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: The social satire is set at an exclusive Thai resort and follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: Say Her Name: The Life And Death Of Sandra Bland
programme.desc: The documentary explores the death of Sandra Bland, a politically active African American who, after being arrested for a traffic violation, was found hanging in her jail cell three days later.

programme.title: Temple Grandin
programme.desc: An HBO Original movie starring Claire Danes as Temple Grandin, an autistic young woman who became one of America’s most remarkable success stories.

programme.title: This Is Christmas
programme.desc: In the week before Christmas in the UK, Adam invites the whole carriage to a Xmas party in his commuter train that has broken down in the countryside.

programme.title: The Zen Diaries Of Garry Shandling S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Part two. The film features a wealth of insights from Shandling's personal diaries, along with reflections by his closest friends, family and collaborators.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This film focuses on the evolution of Facebook, and how overnight success and wealth changed the lives of the classmates who created it.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron is welcomed into the top of the social food chain by the elite group of popular girls called "The Plastics," ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George in Tina Fey's new twist on the modern classic, MEAN GIRLS.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Granny and Tweety run a charm school for chickens. When Daffy Duck sees how well the students of the school are eating, he decides to crash his way into the classes.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: Ace fighter pilot Bugs Bunny is the best pilot at the 'Top Wing Fighter Pilot School' until his nemesis Cecil starts breaking all of his records. Can they come together to face a common enemy?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Captain Blacque Jacque Shellaque is searching the high seas for the mythical Slugsmoby. He gets more trouble than help whe he drafts Bugs Bunny to be his first mate.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: Bugs attends an MMA match and sees champion fighter Rhoda Roundhouse cheating. When he calls her out, she challenges him to a fight and the match is on.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 51
programme.desc: Viktor is a clown in The Pretentious Circus when his act is ruined by a critical onlooker, Daffy Duck. Daffy goes out of his way to show Viktor what he thinks a circus should be.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: When a couple of kids get lost in the mall, Bugs entertains them with a strange and imaginative tale until their mom comes, drawing on things around them for inspiration.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 53
programme.desc: Porky is determined to get his Halloween candy back from Daffy, who's hiding in a creep- looking house. But Daffy, and the house, have other plans.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 54
programme.desc: When Wile E. Coyote discovers that the secret behind AcmeInstant's instant delivery service is The Road Runner, he pulls out all the stops to try and capture him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 55
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian is planning an invasion of Earth, but decides he must study a typical Earthling before doing so. Unfortunately for him, the Earthling he chooses is Daffy Duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 56
programme.desc: Leslie is jealous when Bugs is appointed the new Knight of Square Table, so he tries everything to take Bugs out and replace him.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 33
programme.desc: Elmo and Abby are hosting a cook-off called Use! That! Rice! Mia and Ji-Young make special family rice recipes: Mia and her dads make Arroz Imperial and Ji-Young and Alan make Kimbap. Everyone learns that when we share foods that are special to us, we share something special about ourselves.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 34
programme.desc: Elmo, Abby, and Tamir come across a wooden cricket. Something new they've never seen before! They try to figure out what it is and learn that it's Dave's favorite musical instrument from Cuba called a guiro.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry mistake burglars' loot for a bag of donuts. Tom chases Jerry through a series of surreal billboards, Spike goes overboard trying to make up for manhandling Tom.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: A troop of robot bellhops cause trouble, Tom becomes canine catnip and more.

programme.title: When Christmas Was Young
programme.desc: A music manager needing a hit reaches back to his high school girlfriend - who once dreamt of making it big - for the Xmas song she wrote years ago.

programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A man falls in love with a woman who suffers from severe short-term memory loss.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 10
programme.desc: During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Catherine Zeta-Jones lend their voices to this adventure-filled animated tale.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 12
programme.desc: After an overpass collapses on the highway, Team Tennyson is in a traffic jam along with Simon Sez and family, but when Ben and Simon team up to tackle the gridlock together, Simon only makes matters much, much worse.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 13
programme.desc: At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Ben and family go to London to visit the legendary Big Ben, the Bugg Brothers are there to greet them - with yet another outrageously over-the-top plan of course: to shrink the Big Ben bell in order to steal it!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 15
programme.desc: After traveling to Tampa Beach, Florida, Team Tennyson hope to get some much-needed rest & relaxation, but the tempests without a temper, the Weatherheads, have other plans that Ben must thwart: to build a new beach base!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 16
programme.desc: While visiting China, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max take a trek to the Great Wall, but their adventure is nearly ruined by daredevils LaGrange and Vin Ethanol trying to jump the international monument, and Ben must hop into the Rustbuggy to chase away the fast and furious foes.

programme.desc: Prairie Dawn is hosting a cookie party where all the cookies are baked in all kinds of shapes! Cookie Monster is excited to eat all the octagon shaped cookies but needs to figure out which of the cookies are octagons.

programme.desc: In this 'mostly musical' episode, Bugs agrees to take care of Porky's two hamsters. He brings them home, and wakes up the next morning to find out that the hamsters have multiplied and taken over.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 59
programme.desc: Bugs and Cecil each get half of the last dozen Potato Balls from a popular food truck. When they learn they're going to the same party, the race is on to see who can arrive with the snacks first.

programme.desc: When Count BloodCount steals all the blood from the blood bank, Vampire Hunter Daffy Duck joins a frightened Porky Pig to get it back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 61
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.desc: The easily riled Gabby Goat makes a stop at Porky Pig's Day Spa to try and relax.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: After a nation-wide scandal, The Barden Bellas must regain their composure to defend their legacy and win the World Championships of A Cappella.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po's new life as The Dragon Warrior is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain determined to conquer China and destroy Kung Fu.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 17
programme.desc: During a family cookout at a forest campsite, Charmcaster users her magic to switch places with Gwen, but when Ben catches 'Charmcaster' sneaking about, he attacks- unaware it's actually his cursed cousin!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 18
programme.desc: In Aspen, Colorado, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max are on a hike to find the Forgeti, but when they realize they've stumbled upon Billy Billions own 'Winter in July' ski resort, Ben must battle Billy-with an assist from the Forgeti itself.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: Ben hops into the Rustbuggy for a driving lesson along the sand dunes of Cape Cod, but he takes a freaky switchback turn when the Rustbuggy is mutated into a motor-monster by Bootleg - another alien transformation of Kevin 11, with powers similar to Upgrade!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: Team Tennyson travel to the Chrysalen Institute for some hot yoga and good vibes, only to find that the Bugg Brothers are on vacation, too- but are the sneaky insectoids really on holiday, or just cooking up yet another silly, yet high stakes scheme?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 21
programme.desc: After a battle with Kevin gets mysteriously cut short, Ben turns his attention to one-upping Gwen at Space Camp, but when his arch-nemesis, Kevin, returns with his sights strangely set on his cousin, our hero must uncover who is really behind it all: Charmcaster!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 22
programme.desc: When attacked in the jungle, Team Tennyson is saved by a toddler who looks eerily similar to Tim Buktu, but when they discover it really is a pint-sized version of the nefarious globetrotter, Ben knows there's another threat looming: Nanny Nightmare!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 - EP 23
programme.desc: After enjoying some local corn, Team Tennyson discovers a Hartfield-McJoy reenactment in the cornfield next door, but when Hex resurrects the ghosts of the real feuding families, Ben must find a way to bring them together if he is to save the day!

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Ruby struggles both to save the well and grant the wish of an enemy of the community.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A chase lands Tom & Jerry into a dumpster and more.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Tom is to keep a chimp away from bananas and more.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 67
programme.desc: Jungle adventurer Daffy Duck is searching for a rare blue orchid. He and his assistant Porky Pig go spelunking down into a cave to find it, leading them to discover things that are treacherous.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 68
programme.desc: Claudette and Pepe Le Pew are ordered to the moon to stop evil Elmer Blofudd from destroying the world. The mission will be completed if Claudette can keep Pepe's focus on Blofudd instead of on her.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 69
programme.desc: After exposure to Wile E. Coyote's invention, Tweety Bird has the power to transform into Monster Tweety. When Sylvester tries to make Tweety his lunch, he is terrorised by this new menacing beast.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 70
programme.desc: Bugs finds himself in Area 51, and meets an intelligent Martian baby named Mot. He decides to help the adorable alien escape, but first they must get through four-star general Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 71
programme.desc: Porky is on trial for a minor violation, and is assigned Daffy Duck as an attorney. What could go wrong?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 72
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is interviewed on the Shelley Lippa show in Sydney to talk about his lifestyle. When Bugs finds out that part of that lifestyle is eating rabbits, he decides to do make a fool out of Tad.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 73
programme.desc: After a plane crash, Porky and Daffy end up stranded on a deserted island together. Porky references a survival guide, while Daffy takes a more 'wing it' approach.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 74
programme.desc: Elmer goes hunting for the title ingredient in his duck gumbo, but Daffy turns out to be not-so-cooperative prey.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 75
programme.desc: Rhoda Roundhouse wants to be the first to summit Mt. Killamesoftly, but with Bugs as her sherpa it's going to be more than your average uphill climb.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 - EP 76
programme.desc: Porky's dream of a peaceful train ride is disrupted by fast talking, luggage-toting Petunia Pig.

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: When a newly developed suburb threatens the livelihood of a group of local animals, a savvy raccoon named RJ comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Under The Boardwalk
programme.desc: Musical set on the Jersey Shore where sea crab tourists clash with land crab townies.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: After their break-up, a couple struggles to live together under one roof and neither party is willing to move out.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso, CNBC’s flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Us Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: PFAS chemicals are used in thousands of products aimed at making life easier. But the chemicals are now almost everywhere, including in human blood, and are being linked to severe health problems.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.
